description: This boy sounded like a little whelp on the phone. He kept blabbing something about renovating his apartment. I didn´t want to go to another shithole but I felt really horny today. I gave the boy a chance. It was one of the best decisions I did this month. The boy was a bit shy but absolutely stunning. Young, with a beautiful face and an outstanding body. Being helped by his parents and girlfriend, he put together a pretty big sum. But he blew a big portion of his renovation budget on strippers when he was out with his friends. He needed 25 000 to finish the reconstruction. I didn´t hesitate for a second. I couldn´t wait to have my cock in his beautiful mouth. His girlfriend was not coming home today so we had all day to play with this angel.
title: Debt Dandy 180
